alert.note: Alert for Clay (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clay County through 415 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clay Center, or 17 miles east of Hastings, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clay Center and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
